about_the_game:
Dial your hulking arpeggiators toward the sun.

Twist your squiggling oscillators toward the moon.

Break out the cellos, bust out the bongos, beget the doumbeks.
Club Low starts rolling at 3pm Thursday and the last person doesn't leave til 10am Monday Morning.

That's the kind of party this place provides.

There's ice cream on the mezzanine and pizza in the ovens aplenty.

Oddballs, agents, undercover fools, grifters, shape-shifters, rule-benders and breakers all make their presence known at Club Low.

People who want to get into trouble, get out of trouble, or simply exist inside a steady chamber of trouble and rhythm - Club Low is their playground.

And maybe yours, too.

All tracks Cosmo D
Mastered by LOPAZZ in Heidelberg, Germany
